price: Ẹnikẹ́ni tí ó bá ṣiṣẹ́ aburú kan tàbí tí ó ṣàbòsí sí ẹ̀mí ara rẹ̀, lẹ́yìn náà tí ó tọrọ àforíjìn lọ́dọ̀ Allāhu, ó máa bá Allāhu ní Aláforíjìn, Aláàánú.
arabic: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ سُوٓءًا أَوۡ يَظۡلِمۡ نَفۡسَهُۥ ثُمَّ يَسۡتَغۡفِرِ ٱللَّهَ يَجِدِ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
